about_the_game:
Descend into the Rusty Lake Underground and travel through the life and memories of Laura Vanderboom!

Travel from station to station, each metro stop symbolising a piece of Laura's past and future. Solve various puzzles, find the correct metro to board and uncover one of Laura’s timelines, while simultaneously helping her make sense of her life and escape the corruption of her mind!

Underground Blossom Demo is a new point-and-click adventure developed by the creators of the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake series.
detailed_description:
Descend into the Rusty Lake Underground and travel through the life and memories of Laura Vanderboom!

Travel from station to station, each metro stop symbolising a piece of Laura's past and future. Solve various puzzles, find the correct metro to board and uncover one of Laura’s timelines, while simultaneously helping her make sense of her life and escape the corruption of her mind!

Underground Blossom Demo is a new point-and-click adventure developed by the creators of the Cube Escape & Rusty Lake series.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8, Snow Leopard 10.6.3, or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris Graphics 540 or better
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Underground Blossom Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7,8, 10 or later
  • Processor: 2.4GHz Dual Core
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: Underground Blossom Demo is an upcoming adventure game by Rusty Lake. Fulfil various tasks at every station to find the metro that will take you through each important event from Laura Vanderboom's life.
